actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy, Climate and Grid Security

official_title: Disapproving a rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to "Approval and Promulgation of Implementation Plans; Texas; Revisions to the New Source Review (NSR) State Implementation Plan (SIP); Flexible Permits; Final Rule".

summary.text: Disapproves and nullifies the rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) relating to "Approval and Promulgation of Implementation Plans; Texas; Revisions to the New Source Review (NSR) State Implementation Plan (SIP); Flexible Permits; Final Rule" that was published on July 15, 2010.

titles.title: Disapproving a rule submitted by the Environmental Protection Agency relating to "Approval and Promulgation of Implementation Plans; Texas; Revisions to the New Source Review (NSR) State Implementation Plan (SIP); Flexible Permits; Final Rule".
